# @paprika/field-types - 0.0.0

## Description

Field Types package is a set of components that help the Table and DataGrid to enhance the cell property to display different value in a ease manner

## Installation

```
yarn add @paprika/field-types
```

or with npm:

```
npm install @paprika/field-types
```

## Props

### FieldTypes

| Prop     | Type | required | default | Description |
| -------- | ---- | -------- | ------- | ----------- |
| children | node | true     | -       |             |

### Numeric

| Prop                | Type                                                       | required | default           | Description                                                                                                                                   |
| ------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| cell                | [string,number]                                            | true     | -                 | The cell value to be localize                                                                                                                 |
| align               | [ types.align.LEFT, types.align.RIGHT, types.align.CENTER] | false    | types.align.RIGHT | Text alignment for the number default is right                                                                                                |
| intl                | object                                                     | false    | {}                | The window.Intl.numberFormat option object https://mzl.la/3iW0ioQ                                                                             |
| currency            | string                                                     | false    | null              | When passing a currency string as 'EUR' or 'JPY' will display the correct currency symbol, is a short version instead of using the intl prop. |
| color               | string                                                     | false    | null              | Add a color to the number, accept any kind of html color #F60, rgba(100,100,100, 0.5), etc.                                                   |
| displayOnlyDecimals | bool                                                       | false    | true              | Controls if the number should be display with full delimiter or only the decimal separators                                                   |

#FieldTypes

FieldTypes component helps during your [Table](https://github.com/acl-services/paprika/tree/master/packages/Table) or [DataGrid](https://github.com/acl-services/paprika/tree/master/packages/DataGrid) implementation providing you with small components that encapsulate specific stylings for specific types that adapts to our Design System.

## Uses

Once the component is imported:

```js
import FieldTypes from "@paprika/field-types";
```

You can make use of different Fields in the following way:

```js
/**
 *  Using the Numeric field. The following applies either for the <Table /> or <DataGrid /> component
 */

import FieldTypes from "@paprika/field-types";

function App() {
  return <FieldTypes.Numeric align={FieldTypes.types.align.LEFT} currency="USD" number={1240} />;
}
```
